Subject: Re: It's Battle Time!
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: KSLawdogg@...

(TheCODE, your swearing was unneeded, so I suggest not doing it OOC, if you 
can't handle having numerous characters, to bad, stop complaining, you 
started the attack, remember?  I'm taking back control of the Oblitercons 
from Zardus, and I must say, this is one of the most entertaining battles 
since my time in the RPG, I LOVE WAR)


Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Scattershot/Unitron/Punch/Demon Wulf/Flesh 
Ripper/Dark Claw/Minion/Chaos/Serpentor/Sixshot/Ares/Shockwave:



Nemesis Enforcer dodged Shokaract's missiles easily by taking off into the 
air, but ten of Jetstorm's blasts dug into his abdomen.  Yelling out in pain, 
Nemesis fired off 25 rapid laser bolts off at Jetstorm.  "YOU AREN'T MAKING 
ME HAPPY!"

--

Scattershot laughed (since Sharpedge wasn't exactly point blank, that's what 
I'm basing this one, Alloran), taking off into the air, firing off 20 rounds 
of bullets down at Sharpedge, all of the Mafia's blasts and other weapons 
fire passing under him harmlessly.

---

Unitron transforms into his tank mode, firing off blasts that intercepted 
three of the missiles, one digging into his side making a huge dent.  The 
machine gun mounted on the top of his tank mode swerved, firing off 25 rapid 
laser bolts at Stronghold's chest.

-----

Serpentor sidesteps, a single blast digging into his right side, his armor 
damged in that section somewhat badly.  Raising his weapon, Serpentor fired a 
blast from his plasma launcher off at Blender.

Punch, inside the Alliance base, directs most of the Alliance base's autoguns 
to fire upon Diskus, Deemos, Gigas, and Blender.

---

Demon Wulf laughs as the four blasts hit his chest.  Not even flinching, 
Demon Wulf looks down to the charred part of his chest and gives a slight 
smirk, showing off his rows of deadly teeth.

Raising his optics, he fired off three pairs of crimson lasers from his optic 
sensors at Gigas' sternum, at the same time raising his sword, the blade 
launching off, now a missile, heading at Gigas' pelvis, a new blade replacing 
the old one.

---

Dark Claw laughs loudly as the blasts strike his chest.  Raising both palms 
now, two black balls of energy appear in them, Dark Claw throwing both 
explosive balls of energy with a grenade-like effect at Shockaract.

---

Flesh Ripper is engulfed in flames, stepping out of the flames laughing, his 
fur singed.  Raising his rifle, he fired off four blasts at Serge's neck, 
three optic blasts at Serge's legs.

---

Chaos caugh three blasts in his grill, the other five smashed into his left 
light.  Activating his missile launcher in the back of his trailer mode, he 
fired off two missiles at Rizopas.

---

Minion caught all the bullets in his hood, transforming to robot mode.  He 
raised his rocket launcher, firing off a missile at Ice Doom's chest.

---

Dark One transformed into jet fighter mode, launching into the air, firing 
two missiles down at Diskus.

---

Pyro, still in tank mode, fired off three fire balls at Diskus.

---

Hiss raised his fusion cannon, firing four blasts off at Shockaract.

---

Breakdown transformed into his artillery mode, firing off a mortar at Ice 
Demon.

---

Scavenger took out his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at Blender's 
pelvis.

---

Sixshot flew into the seen in his space fighter mode, firing off twenty-five 
rapid laser blasts down at Gigas.  "Zardus, I wish to join your group.  Shuko 
is dead, there's nothing left!  I need sanctuary, as does Ares."

---

Ares, in tank mode, drove up, the four barrels of his tank mode moving 
slighty, three shots from each firing off, a total of twelve laser bolts 
erupting from the barrels of the tank , all heading for Grenade.

======

Shockwave finished his regeneration in the forest close to the Alliance base. 
 He could hear the mass gunfire, and the numerous explosions.  It was 
interesting.  On foot, he headed for the Alliance base conserve energy.
